name: Oh, Cult!
description:
Every thousand years or so, when a solar eclipse is visible from the remote Isle of Schaaf, the Cult of Big Sheep gets together to worship their mythical god. Except, this time, after a long night, nobody seems prepared for the ritual thanks to three evil traitors among the cultists. Find and sacrifice 'em!

(Created for Epic MegaJam 2020 over the course of a week.)

Controls

Use WASD to move, Left Mouse Button to interact, X to fast forward. ALT+F4 to quit.

Rules

A match consists of five "action rounds" (each 90 seconds long) for which the players are divided into two teams. The main team, which gets picked by a different leader each round, must solve a number of tasks. (Each character must solve those tasks seperately.)

After 90 seconds, the action round gets resolved. Green smoke (and corresponding icons in the UI) shows that a round was won, meaning that the participants can probably be trusted. Red smoke / a loss means there might be at least one traitor among them.

At the end of round 5, the player picks three suspects to sacrifice.

Choose wisely...
